mapper.select: select * from `account` where id = #{id} and state > 0
select * from `account` where code = #{code} and state > 0 limit 1
select * from `account` where name = #{name} and state > 0 limit 1
select * from `account` where mobile = #{mobile} and state > 0 limit 1
select * from `account` where email = #{email} and state > 0 limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into `account` (name, code, secret, mobile, email, remark, type, ownerId, state, creatorId, createTime) values (#{name}, #{code}, #{secret}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{remark}, #{type}, #{ownerId}, #{state}, #{creatorId}, #{createTime})
